divs: Sighting Details I went outside my uncles to look at stars...first thought object venus..but angle on horizon was too low...very bright.. watched for 5min before getting binoculars...observed for about 20 min in total..at about 8.55..object started moving away at slow speed...with binoculars saw small red light in area around large object...watch lighr for about 20 min total...heading toward US Route 20 and NY state rd 12...object went below tree line and out of sight
trends: There have been no other sightings in Waterville
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: went outside to look at stars..obseved BRIGHT WHITE light at distance
